terms.title: Introduction
terms.discription: Welcome to Offerly! These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our mobile application. By accessing or using Offerly, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms.

terms.title: Definitions
terms.discription:
["App"] refers to Offerly.
["User"] refers to anyone who uses the App.
["We", "us" and "our"] refers to the Offerly team.

terms.title: Use of the App
terms.discription: Users agree to use the app only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of others.

terms.title: Account Registration
terms.discription:
Users will need to create an account to access certain features.
Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information.

terms.title: Offers and Promotions
terms.discription:
The app provides access to offers and promotions from various banks.
We do not guarantee the accuracy or availability of any offer.

terms.title: Prohibited Conduct
terms.discription:
Users must not misuse the app, including but not limited to hacking, spamming, or violating any laws.
Users must not use the app to distribute harmful or illegal content.

terms.title: Intellectual Property
terms.discription:
All content on the app, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Offerly or its licensors.
Users may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works from the app content without our permission.

terms.title: Termination
terms.discription:
We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to the app for any user who violates these terms.
Users can terminate their account at any time.

terms.title: Limitation of Liability
terms.discription:
Offerly is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.
We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use the app.

terms.title: Changes to Terms
terms.discription:
We may update these terms from time to time. Users will be notified of any significant changes.
Continued use of the app after changes are made constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

terms.title: Contact Us
terms.discription: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us using contacy us form.

about_modal.title: About Us
about_modal.aboutUsDisc:
Welcome to [Offerly] your one-stop solution for accessing the best payment card offers from various banks, all in one place.
 
 At Offerly, we understand that managing payment card offers can be overwhelming.That's why we've created a user-friendly platform that brings together the latest and greatest offers from a wide range of banks
about_modal.ourGoalDisc: By consolidating offers from different banks into one convenient app, we save you time and effort, allowing you to focus on what matters most â€“ enjoying the benefits of your payment cards.

perks.title: Comprehensive Coverage
perks.discription: Access offers from multiple banks without switching between apps.

perks.title: User-Friendly Interface
perks.discription: Navigate through offers effortlessly with our intuitive design.

perks.title: Up-to-Date Information
perks.discription: Stay informed with the latest deals and promotions.

perks.title: Personalized Experience
perks.discription: Receive recommendations tailored to your preferences.
